episodes.title: Clash of the Titans
episodes.plot: The 2021 Formula 1 season begins at the Bahrain Grand Prix, where drivers give it everything to take the first checkered flag of the year.

episodes.title: Ace in the Hole
episodes.plot: Now racing for McLaren, Daniel Ricciardo sets out to prove that he's still a force on the track. Meanwhile, teammate Lando Norris puts on the pressure.

episodes.title: Tipping Point
episodes.plot: Red Bull's Max Verstappen pulls off a string of victories. Lewis Hamilton of Mercedes struggles to keep pace. Later, an accident leads to controversy.

episodes.title: A Mountain to Climb
episodes.plot: The Haas team looks to reverse its recent fortunes with a new sponsor and two rookie drivers: Nikita Mazepin and Mick Schumacher.

episodes.title: Staying Alive
episodes.plot: Down but never out, McLaren's Ricciardo goes pedal to the metal in hopes of ruining Ferrari's homecoming at the Italian Grand Prix.

episodes.title: A Point to Prove
episodes.plot: With Williams Racing under new leadership, the storied team looks to put its recent troubles in the rear view mirror and return to greatness.

episodes.title: Growing Pains
episodes.plot: They have the raw talent, but can they handle the pressure? Now Yuki Tsunoda and Esteban Ocon must sink or swim in the rough waters of Formula 1.

episodes.title: Dances with Wolff
episodes.plot: Rumors fly about whether an up-and-coming driver will join Hamilton on team Mercedes, potentially leaving Valtteri Bottas without a seat.

episodes.title: Gloves Are Off
episodes.plot: Only a few races remain, and for drivers desperate for any advantage they can get their hands on, the gloves are officially off.

episodes.title: Hard Racing
episodes.plot: As another fierce season comes to a close, Mercedes and Red Bull face off in what may be the biggest winner-takes-all race of a generation.
